channel.title: Having Problems with my .CFG Files
channel.description:
Alright, so I'll just give you a brief explanation of my problem and my position that I have been for a little while now.
My .CFG files don't open.. I have no idea why, but I'd like to know if I could get some help. I'll give you the story. About 2 Months back the Motherboard on my computer Broke.. I have no idea how, but it did. Luckily I had a spare computer that nobody in my family used. That was unfortunately for a reason.. It's a really old computer and runs slower than you could imagine. Alright, so back to the main problem. I downloaded the same source I was working on when I had my first computer. I restarted all of the work. What I did first was try to restore the areas that I had previously Such as Training areas, and Slayer Areas etc. When I got to the actual NPC's I noticed that my .CFG Files look like this...
[IMG]http://i26.tinypic.com/ml4fme.png[/img]
Alright, and this is what happens when I try to open one of them. Here's Autospawn.CFG for example.
[IMG]http://i29.tinypic.com/2hd3a6c.png[/img]
Alright, so that's basically it.. If you think you know why this has happened, please give me a shout. I am getting extremely frustrated due to the fact that I can't progress with coding until this is off my back. It bothers me ;)
Thanks a bunch,
- Owner Zerk -

item.title: Having Problems with my .CFG Files
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Zerk Owner Zerk
item.description:
@Owner_Zerk wrote:

Whoa… I’ve never thought of that!
I’m an idiot

Thanks a LOT. I have been looking for an answer for over a week or two. Wow…

  • Owner Zerk -

Read full topic

item.title: Having Problems with my .CFG Files
item.dc:creator: @marc_is_hood marc is hood
item.description:
@marc_is_hood wrote:

When you double click it it should come up with the last pic. Well select use a program from a list. Then choose notepad. Then you can edit it. Hope that helped.

Read full topic
